item.description:
Please join us for a fun evening at the movies.

We will be seeing the 7:45 PM show in Natick. I would suggest that people go on line and purchase their tickets ASAP. It is the last weekend before most kids go back to school and this show might sell out.

Hope to see you all at the movies!! :-)

http://www.jordansima...
item.how_to_find_us: We will meet in front of the ticket booth - I will be holding a TFS sign.
item.name: Movie night - Avatar 3D in Imax
